postReview.title: Leicester City 1-2 Chelsea: Jackson and Fernandez mark a happy return for Maresca
postReview.description: Enzo Maresca's return to Leicester City ended with his Chelsea side securing a 2-1 victory in the Premier League.

preReview.title: Preview: Maresca makes his return as Chelsea travel to Leicester City

QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and Chelsea on Sat, 23 Nov 2024 12:30:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Chelsea won 2–1 over Leicester City on Sat, 23 Nov 2024 12:30:00 GMT.
